T02D2457:129b-0: @129b * // dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2457:129b-1: byis pa'i rjes su byis pa 'breng //
T02D2457:129b-3: 'dir byis pa grol bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D2457:129b-5: byis 'ching lam du dkyer ba bshad //
T02D2457:129b-6: de la 'dul ba don yod par grub pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las /
T02D2457:129b-9: de nyid kyis ni grol 'gyur zhing //
T02D2457:129b-10: shes rab stobs kyis bde ba thob //
T02D2457:129b-11: ces gsungs pa'i don mkhas pas mngon du bsten par bya ste /
T02D2457:129b-12: gang de la mchog tu bsdam par bya ba yin pas thog mar rgyud brtag par bya'o //
T02D2457:129b-13: de la cha mnyam pa ni 'dod chags la sogs
T02D2457:129b-14: pa'i nyon mongs pa yun ring por skye bar mi
T02D2457:129b-15: 'gyur yang dngos po des de la 'dod chags la
T02D2457:130a-2: nyon mongs pa chung ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dngos po chen po dang /
T02D2457:130a-4: lhag pa dang phrad cing mngon du gyur pa la ni nyon mongs pa bul bar skye la /
T02D2457:130a-5: 'bring dang chung du la ni shin tu cha phra ba'o //
T02D2457:130a-6: gang zag 'dod chags spyad pa ni chags pa'i dngos po chung du dang /
T02D2457:130a-7: ngan pa la yang chags pa chen por 'gyur na /
T02D2457:130a-8: de las bzlog pa la lta ci smos te yun ring du chags pa'o //
T02D2457:130a-12: lus ngag gis gzhan la tho 'tshams pa ma yin pa dang ;
T02D2457:130a-14: dman pa la mos pa dang /
T02D2457:130a-17: yid mi bde ba mang ba dang /
T02D2457:130a-18: kun dga' ba mang ba dang /
T02D2457:130a-21: 'dzum pa sngon du gtong ba dang /
T02D2457:130a-22: sha rtsi dmar zhing 'gro ba mgyogs pa dang /
T02D2457:130a-23: 'khun bur smra zhing mi brtan pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs su rgyu pa'o //
T02D2457:130a-24: zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni sha rtsi nag cing stobs che ba //
T02D2457:130a-25: drang por 'gro zhing brlang smra ba /
T02D2457:130a-26: thams cad mnar sems dang ldan pa /
T02D2457:130a-27: zhe sdang ba'i dngos po chung du 'khong khro bas kun nas dkris pa sdug po dang /
T02D2457:130a-28: mang po skyed par byed na 'bring dang chen po
T02D2457:130a-29: la lta smos ci dgos te yun ring du gnas
T02D2457:130a-30: par byed do // dbang po mi mnyen mi 'jam gzhan la tho 'tshams //
T02D2457:130a-43: bzhin gyi mdog mi gsal ba'o //
T02D2457:130a-44: gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni rmongs par
T02D2457:130a-45: 'gyur ba'i dngos po chung du la yang gti mug
T02D2457:130a-46: gis kun nas dkris pa sdug po dang /
T02D2457:130a-47: mang po skyed par byed na gzhan lta ci smos te yun ring du gnas par byed do //
T02D2457:130a-51: lus kyi las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang /
T02D2457:130a-52: ngag gi las kyi mtha' lhod pa dang /
T02D2457:130b-1: nye bar byas pa'i las byed //
T02D2457:130b-5: yid mi 'jug / brjed pas shes bzhin du mi spyod /
T02D2457:130b-13: nyes par bshad pa'i chos rnams kyi don kun shes par mi nus /
T02D2457:130b-15: gzhan gyi drir la 'jog / sha mdog nges pa med /
T02D2457:130b-17: gang zag nga rgyal dang ldan pa ni /
T02D2457:130b-18: khengs par gyur pa'i dngos po chung du la yang
T02D2457:130b-19: nga rgyal gyi rgyu kun nas dkris pa stug po
T02D2457:130b-20: dang / mang po skye bar byed na 'bring dang
T02D2457:130b-21: chen po la lta ci smos te yun ring du
T02D2457:130b-25: khengs lus cher brgyan pa la sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson /
T02D2457:130b-26: btsan ngag tu smra zhing mi 'dud /
T02D2457:130b-27: pha ma nya du bla ma lta bu dag la
T02D2457:130b-28: dus gsum du rkyen du 'bab pa'i mchod pa mi
T02D2457:130b-31: phyag 'tshal mngon du ldang thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud
T02D2457:130b-32: par byed pa'i dad tshul can ma yin pa dang
T02D2457:130b-39: rgya chen po la mi mos //
T02D2457:130b-43: srog dang gsob dang gang zag tu lta ba shas che /
T02D2457:130b-45: 'khrug pa dang ldan pa yin te /
T02D2457:130b-46: de lta bu dang mthun pa ni nga rgyal gyi rtags so //
T02D2457:130b-47: phrag dog dang ldan pa'i gang zag ni sha mdog sngo nag pa /
T02D2457:130b-48: 'dus pa'i yul med par rgyu ba /
T02D2457:130b-49: gzhan la gnod par smra zhing /
T02D2457:130b-50: nges pa med pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs rgyu ba'o
T02D2457:130b-51: zhes gsungs pa 'di dag nges par slob dpon gyis
T02D2457:130b-54: bsregs bcad bdar ba'i gser bzhin du //
T02D2457:130b-55: yongs su brtags te nga yi bka' //
T02D2457:130b-56: blang bar bya yis gus phyir min //
T02D2457:131a-0: zhes gsungs pas yongs su sgrol ba la @131a * //
T02D2457:131a-1: bsam gyis mi khyab par 'dod pa dang /
T02D2457:131a-2: rgyu ma dag pa la bsam gyis mi khyab par 'dod pa dang /
T02D2457:131a-3: phyogs tsam la bsam gyis mi khyab par 'dod pa dang /
T02D2457:131a-4: rab tu thal ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'dod pa ste /
T02D2457:131a-5: 'di dag ni rmongs pa rnams kyi dan rtags yin te /
T02D2457:131a-6: mkhas pas kun du spang bar bya ba yin no //
T02D2457:131a-7: blang bar bya ba ni mchog tu gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste //
T02D2457:131a-8: de yang gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02D2457:131a-9: bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02D2457:131a-10: thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02D2457:131a-11: gnyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02D2457:131a-12: 'pho ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02D2457:131a-13: 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang drug go //
T02D2457:131a-14: gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni bla ma'i gdams pa'o //
T02D2457:131a-15: bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni dug lnga spas pa'i lam du 'khyer ba'o //
T02D2457:131a-16: gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa
T02D2457:131a-17: kha cig kyang dug lngar 'dus mod kyi dgongs pa
T02D2457:131a-18: can yin no ; / dug lnga lam du ji ltar 'khyer na /
T02D2457:131a-19: gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa //
T02D2457:131a-20: de ni kun gyi stong nyid yin //
T02D2457:131a-22: 'dod chags kyi stong nyid ji lta ba bzhin du zhe sdang la sogs pa'o //
T02D2457:131a-23: de la phyi nang gi gzugs la sogs pa yid
T02D2457:131a-24: du 'ong ba gcig la chags pa skyes pa de
T02D2457:131a-25: yang kha dog la sogs par ma grub pas na
T02D2457:131a-27: rlung rjes su dpag pa las shes pa de bzhin
T02D2457:131a-28: du shes rig ma 'gags pa'i sgo nas chad pa
T02D2457:131a-29: ma yin no // de gnyis kyi bar de gnyis
T02D2457:131a-30: ka'i bdag nyid can gyi dngos po yang yod pa
T02D2457:131a-31: ma yin no // ma yin te / de bas
T02D2457:131a-32: na bzhi pa ni rjes thob kyi shes pas dpag
T02D2457:131a-33: bar bya ba'i de nyid dus su spros pa ci
T02D2457:131a-34: yang yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2457:131a-35: de la 'dod chags ma spangs rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D2457:131a-36: zhe sdang la sogs pa la smras te /
T02D2457:131a-37: de ni phan tshun spangs te 'gal ba ma yin no //
T02D2457:131a-38: chos kyi dbyings rtogs pas ma lus pa'i yul dug med par byas so zhes gsungs so //
T02D2457:131a-39: sngar smos pa ltar stong pa nyid ni kun du sbyar bar byas la /
T02D2457:131a-40: dug lnga'i btsal thabs ni zhi sdang btsal ba bzhin du kun du blta bar bya'o //
T02D2457:131a-41: de la nang par ldang pa'i dus su de ring
T02D2457:131a-42: ni bdag gi zhe sdang gi dngos po bdag gis
T02D2457:131b-2: zhe sdang skyes pa gang yang rung ste /
T02D2457:131b-3: de dag mchog gi dngos grub thob par byed pa'i
T02D2457:131b-4: yan lag yin pas zhe sdang ci byung tshor bar
T02D2457:131b-5: shog shig par smon lam btab la /
T02D2457:131b-6: nam tshor ba'i dus su zhe sdang de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab par bya'o //
T02D2457:131b-7: gal te de'i nyin par zhe sdang ma byung na sngar bdag nyid zhe sdang skyes pa'am /
T02D2457:131b-9: gzhan gyi phan tshun zhe sdang skyes pa la dran
T02D2457:131b-10: pa bskyed la de nyid rang bzhin med par bya'o
T02D2457:131b-11: // de ltar nang gcig bzhin du smon lam btab la bya'o //
T02D2457:131b-12: de ltar byas pas zhe sdang gi dug gis mi tshugs par bya'o //
T02D2457:131b-13: zhe sdang skyes so cog lam du shes tsam na /
T02D2457:131b-14: dug gzhan la yang de bzhin du shes par bya ste /
T02D2457:131b-15: zhe sdang yid kyi gang zag gis zhe sdang yi
T02D2457:131b-16: dam du byas pas de las su rung ba dang
T02D2457:131b-17: / 'dod chags la sogs pa la sla bar 'ong
T02D2457:131b-18: ba de bzhin du gang gi zhad che ba de
T02D2457:131b-19: thog mar yi dam du bya'o//
T02D2457:131b-20: de nas gzhan la sbyar ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T02D2457:131b-22: nyon mongs pa chung bas kyang thog mar gang yang rung ba cig yi dam byas la /
T02D2457:131b-23: de las su rung ba ngang rim gyis spo bar bya'o //
T02D2457:131b-25: las dang po'i gang zag gis gcig la mchog tu
T02D2457:131b-26: ma gdams na dug lnga mang du 'byung bas yid
T02D2457:131b-28: gzhug lhod pa skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2457:131b-29: de dag ni sngon du bstan par mi bya ste /
T02D2457:131b-30: nam sgom pa'i dus su gzod gang la de gdams
T02D2457:131b-31: pa zhes sngon du bstan pa'i don de ni de
T02D2457:131b-32: nyid yi dam du gdams pa'o //
T02D2457:131b-33: dug lnga'i 'jigs pa btul nas mi 'jigs pa la zhugs pa 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'o //
T02D2457:131b-34: snod shin tu bzang ba la gdams par bya'i /
T02D2457:131b-35: snod ngan tshig tsam la brten nas bag med du spyod pa la ni ma yin no //
T02D2457:131b-36: thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni //
T02D2457:131b-37: gtor ma dang ni bzlas pa dang //
T02D2457:131b-38: dkyil 'khor me dang chu yi las //
T02D2457:131b-39: phyag rgya gdugs sogs mchod pa dang //
T02D2457:131b-40: phyag dang bskor ba bya ba dang //
T02D2457:131b-41: lugs ma'am bris pa la sogs dang //
T02D2457:131b-42: gsung rab bri sogs rtsam pa dang //
T02D2457:131b-43: thams cad dus su rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2457:131b-44: thams cad rang bzhin rtog mi bya //
T02D2457:132a-0: gnyid ni bag med mi log ste @132a * //
T02D2457:132a-1: ji ltar padma kha zum pa //
T02D2457:132a-2: grib mas non pas zum pa ste //
T02D2457:132a-3: grib sel stobs kyis rgyas pa ltar //
T02D2457:132a-4: gsal ba 'das nas ma rig pa //
T02D2457:132a-5: sa mthug gyur pa'i stobs kyis te //
T02D2457:132a-6: dbugs dag me long dkyil 'dus ltar //
T02D2457:132a-7: rim gyis bsdus te ma rig pa //
T02D2457:132a-8: shes rab kyis ni spyang byas nas //
T02D2457:132a-9: gcig shos la ni nges 'dus pa //
T02D2457:132a-10: ma goms pa las yid mi 'byung //
T02D2457:132a-11: goms pas yid gnyis med ba ni //
T02D2457:132a-12: rab tu 'bad pa'i sems goms yin //
T02D2457:132a-14: 'pho ba'i dus su bsam mi khyab //
T02D2457:132a-15: las kyi shugs kyis 'pho ba dang //
T02D2457:132a-16: rnal 'byor lceb pa'i man ngag go //
T02D2457:132a-17: bsgom bya smig rgyu la sogs la //
T02D2457:132a-18: mthong 'og de nyid gnas pa dang //
T02D2457:132a-19: rang bzhin gyis grub rdo rje'i lus //
T02D2457:132a-20: bdun gyi 'pho ba spangs nas su //
T02D2457:132a-21: srid mi 'jug ste mtha' gnyis spang //
T02D2457:132a-22: sbyor sems sngon du btang ba yis//
T02D2457:132a-25: rkang pa dang ni kha dang lte //
T02D2457:132a-26: snying ga spyi gtsug mig rnams te //
T02D2457:132a-28: rim pa bzhin du skye zhing 'thob //
T02D2457:132a-29: dmyal ba yi dags byol song dang //
T02D2457:132a-30: mi dang lha dang ye shes so //
T02D2457:132a-31: de nas sgo gzhan dgag byas la //
T02D2457:132a-32: mig nas rlung ni phul bar bya //
T02D2457:132a-33: bla ma'i zhal la gnas pa'o //
T02D2457:132a-34: de bzhin lceb pa'ang zhal la gnas //
T02D2457:132a-35: rnal 'byor mi shes gang zag gis //
T02D2457:132a-36: mi dang lha yi skye ba ru //
T02D2457:132a-37: blang ba'i sems ni gcig bya //
T02D2457:132a-38: rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i nang nas kyang //
T02D2457:132a-39: 'chi ka'i sems ni gtso yin pas //
T02D2457:132a-40: gang ltar bsams pa de ltar 'gyur //
T02D2457:132a-42: 'on sdig pa can yang de ltar 'gyur ram zhen mi 'gyur te /
T02D2457:132a-43: sdig che las kyis bskal nas ni //
T02D2457:132a-44: man ngag 'dod na mi phrad de //
T02D2457:132a-45: gal te phrad na glang gzer dang //
T02D2457:132a-46: smyo 'bog sogs pas mi dran no //
T02D2457:132a-47: 'o na tshogs bsags pa la 'da' ka'i sems med kyang bde 'gro ru skyo'o zhe na /
T02D2457:132a-48: tshogs du ma bsags kyang 'chi kar sems ngan skyes na rgyal po ma skyes dgra lta bu'o //
T02D2457:132a-49: de bas na 'da' ka ma'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa la shin tu 'bad par bya'o //
T02D2457:132b-0: 'bras bu bsam @132b gyis mi khyab pa ni sku dang ye shes te /
T02D2457:132b-1: gser ni mi gtsang nang du bcug gyur kyang //
T02D2457:132b-2: 'bar ba'i rang bzhin nam yang mi spong ltar //
T02D2457:132b-3: nges pa gang zhig 'jig rten chos spyod kyang //
T02D2457:132b-4: bsam pa'i rang bzhin nam yang de mi spong //
T02D2457:132b-5: zhes gsungs pas gzugs skus 'gro ba'i don byed pa
T02D2457:132b-6: na yang 'jig rten gyi bya ba ngan pa dang
T02D2457:132b-7: bral ba'o // de ltar rgyu dang 'bras bu thams
T02D2457:132b-8: cad du gnyis su med pa kho na yin zhing
T02D2457:132b-9: bral ba'o // / dug lnga shin tu btsal bar
T02D2457:132b-10: bya ba yin kyang thog ma med pa'i dus nas
T02D2457:132b-11: phyin ci log la goms pa'i dbang gis shes rab
T02D2457:132b-12: dang bral nas log pa'i shes rab rgyu bas dben
T02D2457:132b-14: mi rtog pa'i nus pa rnyed nas tshogs kyi gseb
T02D2457:132b-15: tu phyin kyang zhe sdang la sogs gang byung yang
T02D2457:132b-16: dran pa dang mi 'bral zhing gzhan gyi dbang du
T02D2457:132b-17: mi 'gro na dus la bab pa'o //
T02D2457:132b-18: yang na kun du rgyu nyid bya ste /
T02D2457:132b-19: gnas gcig tu yun ring di gnas par mi bya ste /
T02D2457:132b-20: mi dang khyi 'dra bas khyi yang rang gi gnas ni stobs che la /
T02D2457:132b-21: yul gzhan du dul bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2457:132b-22: de bzhin du mi yang rang gi gnas na nyon mongs pa dul bar dka' ste /
T02D2457:132b-23: yul gzhan du nyon mongs pa thul bar sla bas kun du rgyu'i tshul la gnas par bya'o //
T02D2457:132b-24: gang zhig bdag gis byas bsod kyis //
T02D2457:132b-25: kun kyang 'tshe ba med par shog / gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis //
T02D2457:132b-26: sangs rgyas nyid du grub par shog / dug lnga
T02D2457:132b-27: sbas pa'i lam mchog tu gsang ba bsam gyis mi
